text: This is a book depicting the joys and sorrows of a teenager's growth process.
This book is a science fiction novel that tells the story of how humans coexist with aliens in the future world.
This is a non-fiction book about World War II history, detailing the heroic deeds and tragic events during the war.
This book vividly depicts the ,magnificent scenery of nature and the life of wild animals.
This is a crime mystery novel that reveals the truth behind a seemingly perfect crime.
